::Drarkfate ::

Darkfte was every time more mad, that nnoyed virus mde him blind for  
lrge while, soon he reacted nd  flew over virus's cloud nd used his 
commlink "to all my faction, reagroup around me"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::KitKat::
> 
> She watched as Apocolypse tore the head off Destructor. She 
wondered 
> if he was going to do the same to her. She lowered her hand on her 
> gun as he turned to her.  She noticed how he addressed her as 
master 
> and relaxed slightly. But she wasn't sure just how this bot would 
> react or how he would fight. But what she had just witnessed, he 
was 
> good. She nodded to him and smiled slightly, trying to hide her 
> emotion over Destructor's death. 
> "Yes, it appears we do have things to discuss. Please, let us go to 
> another room where we can talk without interuption."
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, kinger01030@c... wrote:
> >  Death landed at the base. It was not familiar but he knew 
> destructor and it 
> > could only mean an advantage. All the horsmen created eachother. 
> Once again 
> > reunited. Destructor also said hello. Suddenly the origanal 5 
> looked up in 
> > pure terror. They all looked at the tm2 dragon landing at thier 
> feet. 
> > "Apocalypse!" those would be the last words of the once great 
> > destructor....Apocalypse grabbed him by the throat and proceeded 
to 
> rip off 
> > his head. Apocalypse wiped the mech fluid of his hands. He turned 
> to Kit Kat. 
> > "My name is apocalypse. We have much to discuss. Destructor was a 
> weak being. 
> > Now the real war can begin." all the horsmen bowed on all fours 
to 
> thier new 
> > master. War looked up with a tear in his eye and one thought in 
his 
> > head.."Destructor will be reseracted. When the day is right."
